app.title: UnusualChessboard
app.description: A collection of unusual chess and board games with multiple platforms support

welcome_message: A modern multi-platform board game collection with 28 classic board games and various casual mini-games.
author: *UnusualChessboard* Development Group

games.title: Games Collection
games.subtitle: Explore our collection of classic and unusual board games

chess.name: Chess
chess.description: The classic strategy board game played on an 8×8 checkered board

chinese_chess.name: Chinese Chess (Xiangqi)
chinese_chess.description: A strategy board game for two players played on a 9×10 board

shogi.name: Japanese Chess (Shogi)
shogi.description: A strategy board game similar to chess, but with different pieces and rules

makruk.name: Thai Chess (Makruk)
makruk.description: A board game similar to chess, but with its own distinct movement of pieces

go.name: Go (Weiqi)
go.description: An abstract strategy board game for two players where the aim is to surround territory

gobang.name: Gobang (Five in a Row)
gobang.description: A strategy board game where players aim to create a row of five stones

reversi.name: Reversi (Othello)
reversi.description: A strategy board game played on an 8×8 board where players capture opponent's discs

checkers.name: Checkers
checkers.description: A strategy board game for two players with diagonal moves and captures

sheep.name: Sheep a Sheep
sheep.description: A popular puzzle game where you match three identical pieces to clear them

snake.name: Snake
snake.description: A classic game where you control a snake that grows longer as it eats food

jump.name: Jump Jump
jump.description: A casual game where the player jumps from platform to platform

2048.description: A sliding puzzle game where you combine numbered tiles to reach 2048
